title: Number Line
text: To think about this question, you might want to locate 8 and 13 on a number line.

title: Using Number Line to Reach Conclusion
text: For numbers a and b, when a is to the left of b on the number line, we say $$a<b$$ (read \"a is less than b\").

title: Answer
text: Since 8 is to the left of 13 on the number line, we say $$8<13$$.
